title: A Time To Love
description: A TIME TO LOVE by Lee Ann Sontheimer Murphy Reclusive songwriter Samuel Baird lives on a remote Arkansas mountain drinking his life away. The last thing he wants is a woman to complicate things but during a spectacular thunderstorm, a woman arrives just in time to save his life. She says she comes from the late 1800's and he thinks she is crazy but Annie still manages to gain his attention and affection. To reach a happily ever after, Samuel and Annie must overcome several obstacles, past and present, but in the end, they find the happiness that they seek. LEARN MORE AT http://leeannsontheimermurphywriterau...
author: Lee Ann Sontheimer Murphy
